column2: I was playing when suddently my head started to hurt and everything aroung me started to swirl around in blue colors.
Arrrg...
I heard my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] screaming, when I ran to him he had collapsed on floor with blue light swirling aroung him... magic.

Everything will be fine.
I need to think...
